# 고도 데이터

[[elevatr](https://github.com/jhollist/elevatr)]{.aside}


- [Find GPS Coordinates on Google maps](https://www.maps.ie/coordinates.html)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)
library(elevatr)
library(sf)
library(rayshader)
library(tmap)

woodo <- tibble(x = 126.95, y = 33.50) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("x", "y"), crs = 4236)

woodo_elev <- get_elev_raster(woodo, z = 13)
woodo_elmat = raster_to_matrix(woodo_elev)

woodo_elmat %>%
  sphere_shade(texture = "imhof3") %>%
  add_water(detect_water(woodo_elmat, cutoff = 0.95), color = "blue") %>%
  plot_map()



```
